overview: What happens when you lock ten of the sexiest porn stars in the biz under the same roof and ask the fans to vote in and crown the new queen of porn? Only the super-hot reality TV porn series Brazzers House, your best chance to see the baddest babes shooting today teamed up and facing off in a series of skill-testing challenges! This 3 disc DVD set is jam packed with all 7 Brazzers House episodes, including sex challenges and the orgy finale. Also included are 4 bonus sex scenes, and behind the scenes footage. See who has what it takes to be the fan voted winner of Brazzers House.
title: Brazzers House
